      • checkCell

        public boolean checkCell(Position pos,
                         Entity entity)
        Checks if the cell the hero is trying to move is a valid cell.To be valid it needs to be a free cell (' '). It also checks if the hero is moving to the lever or to an open door updating the game status accordingly.
        Specified by:
        checkCell in class Level
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating if the cell is valid or not.

      • update

                   Entity entity)
        Updates the position of a certain character.
        Specified by:
        update in class Level
        Parameters:
        pos - the position the character is moving.
        entity - the character to be updated.

      • moveEnemy

        public void moveEnemy()
        Updates the position of every ogre as well as each of the clubs. It also checks whether or not the hero stunned any ogre.
        Specified by:
        moveEnemy in class Level

      • checkEnemy

        public boolean checkEnemy()
        Checks whether or not any club has hit the hero.
        Specified by:
        checkEnemy in class Level
        Returns:
        returns a boolean indicating if the hero was hit by a club.

      • readFromFile

        public static Keep readFromFile(java.io.File file)
        Reads from a file and creates a new Keep level. Has the ability to create the level at any state: the beginning, after the hero has moved, before/after the lever has been activated.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be read
        Returns:
        a new Keep level
